'''Hal Leonard''' is the husband of [[Cheryl Leonard]].

==History==
Hal met Cheryl while her ex-husband, [[Holden McKee|Holden]], was in a nursing home. They got married, though he said it took Cheryl a long time to move on from Holden, and they were expecting a child together. Hal came to the hospital with Cheryl when she was informed that her ex-husband was there and would likely be waking up soon.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
He is married to [[Cheryl Leonard]]. They are expecting a child together.

===Familial===
He and his wife are expecting a child together. He is also involved with her son, [[Coby McKee|Coby]] from her first marriage.
